newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures finish near the daily highs.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures finish near the daily highs.

text.p: Oct 22 - IMM currency futures finished near the daily highs. A late short-covering rally lifted most contracts to fresh session highs. Retail accounts were extremely short and were forced to cover positions when dollar hit sell stops. Dlr/mark hit sell stops at 1.5280 spot, or $0.6567 in Dec marks. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
